move_details.name: light-that-burns-the-sky
move_details.effect_description: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher. Determining which stat is used takes into account stat changes but not held items or abilities.
move_details.flavor_text: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma.  This move ignores the target’s Ability.
